about.title: About Me

article1.title: A First Look at Transitioning from Xamarin Native to Flutter
article1.description: In this article, I want to share my experience of transitioning from Xamarin Native to Flutter. I will try to compare the two frameworks from the perspective of personal experience, discuss my old misconceptions about declarative frameworks that were dispelled by my experience with Flutter, and at the end of the article, I will reflect on my ideal mobile framework of dreams.

article2.title: Simple Localization of .NET Applications with Slang.Net
article2.description: In this article, I want to share knowledge about how to quickly and easily localize a .NET application using my own localization solutionâ€”Slang.Net.
